fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`BLENDVPS xmm1, xmm2/m128, <XMM0>`
`/is4 VBLENDVPS xmm1, xmm2, xmm3/m128, xmm4`
`/is4 VBLENDVPS ymm1, ymm2, ymm3/m256, ymm4`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Conditionally copy each dword data element of single-precision floating-point value from the second source operand and the first source operand depending on mask bits defined in the mask register operand. The mask bits are the most significant bit in each dword element of the mask register.
